roleset.name: forming into an outward pouch

example.name: outpouching-n
example.text: A brain aneurysm is an abnormal outpouching of one of the arteries in the brain similar to a bad tire with the bulging of the side wall.
example.arg: of one of the arteries in the brain
similar to a bad tire with the bulging of the side wall.

roleset.note: OUTPOUCHING-N NOTES: Relation to pouching.01. (from outpouching.01-n)
